ModMetaData.name: NightVision - Goggles are Goggles
ModMetaData.author: Turambar
ModMetaData.description: Patches drumad's NightVision mod so that all goggles (Tinted Goggles and night Vision Goggles) belong to the "Eyes" layer instead of "Headgear", allowing you to wear them in combination with hats and basic helmets.
